alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 8:44AM CDT until May 06 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Whitewater River at Towanda affecting Butler County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Walnut River at Augusta affecting Butler and Cowley Counties. For the Walnut River...including El Dorado, Augusta, Winfield, Arkansas City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Walnut River at Augusta. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Secondary roads in the vicinity of Augusta begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 23.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Walnut River Augusta 23.0 23.8 Thu 8 am CDT 14.8 8.7 6.9 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
